participant_1.background:
I wake up early and go for a run to clear my head and start the day off right.
I have a baby monitor in my nursery so I can hear my child when they wake up.
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
I had a birthday party with my family and friends and ate lots of cake, except for the tomatoes.
My heart breaks when I think about the time my dog died.

participant_2.background:
My friends would be so impressed by my cupcake recipe.
my father was a dry wall finisher.
i enjoy cold winters and strong breezes.
I'm so grateful to have a family that supports my creative career.
I'm going to be spending time with my family and friends, and relaxing.

content.text: Hey, it's going well! I'm spending time with my family and friends.
Same here! I'm going to a birthday party later today.
Oh, that sounds fun! Do you have any fun plans for the rest of the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go for a run or do some gardening.
I'm not much of a runner, but I love gardening! I have a lot of plants in my backyard.
That's awesome! I wish I had a backyard. I live in an apartment, so I have to do all my gardening in pots.
I know what you mean. I used to live in an apartment too, and I had to get creative with my gardening.
Yeah, it can be tough. But it's still fun!
So, what's your favorite thing to do in the winter?
I love going skiing! There's a great ski resort near my house.
That sounds fun! I've never been skiing before.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
